product_name: Columbia Mountain Clear EXS Cargo Shorts - Men's 11" Inseam - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Stroll through town on a sunny summer day or take a quick hike in the hills with the sun-protective Columbia Mountain Clear EXS Cargo Shorts with an 11" inseam. Blend of cotton and polyester has a soft hand for great comfort. Fabric provides UPF sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. 11-in. inseam provides a bit of extra coverage. Front hand pockets, bellowed side cargo pockets with rip-and-stick closures and rear pockets with rip-and-stick closures provide ample storage space. Closeout.
short_description: Stroll through town on a sunny summer day or take a quick hike in the hills with the sun-protective Columbia Mountain Clear EXS Cargo Shorts with an 11" inseam.
